## SARA Online Python Course for Beginners

Unlock the Power of Coding with Python – Start Your Journey Today!

### Course Overview

The SARA Python Programming for Beginners course is designed for absolute newcomers to coding. Whether you’re a student, professional, or hobbyist, this course will equip you with foundational Python skills through hands-on projects, interactive lessons, and expert guidance. Learn to automate tasks, analyze data, and build simple applications—no prior experience required!

---

### Course Objectives

By the end of this course, you will:

  - Understand Python syntax, variables, loops, and functions.

  - Write programs to solve real-world problems.

  - Work with data using lists, dictionaries, and file handling.

  - Build mini-projects (e.g., a calculator, data analyzer, or simple game).

  - Gain confidence to pursue advanced Python topics or data science.
  
---

### Course Highlights

✅ Flexible Learning: Self-paced modules with lifetime access.

✅ Beginner-Friendly: Step-by-step tutorials with clear examples.

✅ Hands-On Practice: Code exercises, quizzes, and projects.

✅ Certificate of Completion: Share your achievement on LinkedIn!  

---

### Course Format:

- Duration: 15 hours (every alternate second Saturday)

- Mode: Only online sessions available
